comments_since_last_sample.body: Hey, just wanted to say latin music is actually really really really diverse. There's so much variety, so many artists doing so many different things even on mainstream. I think the misconception comes from the fact that international listeners only gets some reggaeton which does tend to be more repetitive, but it's definitely not representative of latin music as a whole.
